name: @coopdigital/foundations-icons
description: Code for generating SVG sprites using svg-sprite and NPM scripts

scripts.update-sprite-with-preview: svg-sprite -s --symbol-dest dist --symbol-sprite coop-icon-sprite.svg --symbol-example true --symbol-example-dest index.html src/icons/*.svg
scripts.serve-example: npm run update-sprite-with-preview && cd dist && python -m SimpleHTTPServer

author: @coopdigital
